title: Solo Ranked cut off (3 o clock)
body: It happens everyday when does ranked come back?

replies.body: Its really upsetting but it comes back at 7am ish ;( I'm waiting to
Check out the queue schedule thats pinned to the boards. Its been there for some time =P http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/wgM0WBsO-queue-schedule-updated-dec-1st
